body:
The offending commit (if it's in any way relevant to why the return value of `copyValue` is ignored): https://github.com/golang/go/commit/84b0842a59b8bf8e890861f7859869fb73d8681c

I can submit a CL with with either fix 1 or fix 2 if you'd like.

The more I think about it, option 1 sounds less attractive and option 2 more correct.
